title: Hertz Links Up With Uber to Offer 50,000 Tesla Rentals
sub_head: Partnership comes days after Hertz announced significant investment in electric-vehicle rental fleet
body:
Hertz Global Holdings Inc. said it is joining with Uber Technologies Inc. to add up to 50,000 Tesla vehicles to the Uber network by 2023.
The deal comes days after Hertz said it is making a significant investment in an EV rental fleet, including an initial order of 100,000 Teslas by the end of 2022 and new EV charging infrastructure across the globe.
